Package fel.cvut.pjv

Class BoardTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • fel.cvut.pjv.BoardTile
  • public class BoardTile
extends java.lang.Object
    Smallest unit of gameboard. Is synchronized to prevent concurrent modification. Can contain an entity and an explosion at the same time.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BoardTile()
      BoardTile constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean getCanBeMovedOn()
      Gets whether tile can be moved on. canBeMovedOn property gets set by setContains method.
      fel.cvut.pjv.GameEntity getContains()
      Gets content of tile.
      ExplosionTile getExplosion()
      Gets ExplosionTile.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Gets whether the tile is empty.
      boolean isExploding()
      Gets whether tile is exploding.
      void removeContent()
      Removes tile content and resets all properties tied to it.
      void removeExplosion()
      Removes explosion.
      void setContains​(fel.cvut.pjv.GameEntity contains)
      Sets tile content.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoardTile

        public BoardTile()
        BoardTile constructor.

        Is initiated empty as its content is set during gameBoard setting.

        See Also:
        GameBoard

    • Method Detail

      • getCanBeMovedOn

        public boolean getCanBeMovedOn()
        Gets whether tile can be moved on. canBeMovedOn property gets set by setContains method.

      • getContains

        public fel.cvut.pjv.GameEntity getContains()
        Gets content of tile. Content and explosion can exist simultaneously.

      • setContains

        public void setContains​(fel.cvut.pjv.GameEntity contains)
        Sets tile content. Sets canBeMoved on property based on content.
        Parameters:
        contains - content to be set, its transparency dictates whether tile can be moved on.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Gets whether the tile is empty. A tile that can be moved on is not necessarily empty.

      • removeContent

        public void removeContent()
        Removes tile content and resets all properties tied to it.

      • getExplosion

        public ExplosionTile getExplosion()
        Gets ExplosionTile. Explosion tile does not count as content. getContains will return different value.

      • setExplosion

        public void setExplosion​(ExplosionTile explosion)
        Sets explosionTile. Changes isExploding to true.

      • removeExplosion

        public void removeExplosion()
        Removes explosion. Sets isExploding to false.

      • isExploding

        public boolean isExploding()
        Gets whether tile is exploding. Exploding tile still may have other GameEntity as content.
